name: Shadow's perspective
description:
You are shadow, the little shadow.
Your goal is to exit a room where you can only walk on other shadows.
You always thinked that the world has only 2 Dimention, 3 with Time. But you will discover that there exist 1 more Dimention, and that is going to change everything !

PS : The current version is more like a demonstration of the capacities of the game.
